data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body: With reference to our letters dated June 28, 2023, July 31, 2023, and in accordance with Regulation 30 of the Listing Regulations, we hereby inform you that the Board of Directors (the 'Board') at its Meeting held today, i.e. Thursday, August 3, 2023, have inter alia transacted the following businesses as per enclosed intimation.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript
data.news_body: With reference to our letter dated April 28, 2023, and pursuant to Regulation 30(6) read with Part A of Schedule Ill of the Listing Regulations, we are enclosing herewith the transcript of the proceedings of Fund Managers and Analysts Meet held on May 5, 2023.The aforesaid information is also being made available on the website of the Company at www.bluestarindia.com Kindly take the same on record.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body: With reference to our letters dated April 28, 2023, May 5, 2023, and pursuant to Regulation 30 and 46 of the Listing Regulations, we hereby inform you that the audio recording of the Fund Managers and Analysts Meet held on May 5, 2023, is made available on the website of the Company under the weblink at:https://www.bluestarindia.com/media/343414/earnings-call-q4fy23-audio-recording.mp3 Kindly take the same on record.

data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30(6) of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (the 'Listing Regulations') read with Part A of Schedule III of the Listing Regulations and in continuation to our letter dated April 28, 2023, we are enclosing herewith the Investors' Presentations for the Fourth Quarter and Financial Year ended March 31, 2023, which shall be made at the said Fund Managers and Analysts Meet.The said information is also being made available on the website of the Company at www.bluestarindia.comKindly take the same on record.

data.caption: Regulation 30 Of Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (The 'Listing Regulations') - Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body: With reference to our letter dated December 28, 2022, and in accordance with Regulation 30 of the Listing Regulations, we hereby inform you that the Board of Directors (the 'Board') at its Meeting held today, i.e. Tuesday, January 31, 2023, have inter alia approved and taken on record the Un-audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the Third Quarter and Nine Months ended December 31, 2022, along with the Limited Review Reports, pursuant to Regulation 33 and  52 of the Listing Regulations.The copies of aforesaid Financial Results along with the Limited Review Reports and Press Release issued by the Company in respect of the same are enclosed herewith.The meeting commenced at 11:00 a.m. and concluded at 4: 25 p.m.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Regulation 30 Of Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (The 'Listing Regulations') - Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body:
With reference to our letter dated December 28, 2022, and in accordance with Regulation 30 of the Listing Regulations, we hereby inform you that the Board of Directors (the 'Board') at its Meeting held today, i.e. Tuesday, January 31, 2023, have inter alia approved and taken on record the Un-audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the Third Quarter and Nine Months ended December 31, 2022, along with the Limited Review Reports, pursuant to Regulation 33 and 52 of the Listing Regulations.

The copies of aforesaid Financial Results along with the Limited Review Reports and Press Release issued by the Company in respect of the same are enclosed herewith.

The meeting commenced at 11:00 a.m. and concluded at 4:25 p.m.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Regulation 30 Of Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (The ''Listing Regulations'') - Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body:
With reference to our letter dated October 14, 2022, and in accordance with Regulation 30 of the Listing Regulations, we hereby inform you that the Board of Directors (the ''Board'') at its Meeting held today, i.e. Thursday, November 3, 2022, have inter alia approved and taken on the record the Un-audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the second quarter and half year ended September 30, 2022, along with the Limited Review Reports, pursuant to Regulation 33 and 52 of the Listing Regulations.
At the aforesaid meeting, the Board has also approved amendment to the Company''s ''Code of Internal Procedures and Conduct for Regulating, Monitoring and Reporting of Trading by Insiders and Code of Fair Disclosure of Unpublished Price Sensitive Information'' (the ''Code of Conduct''). The amendment includes modification of the definition of ''Designated Persons''.
The meeting commenced at 11 :00 a.m. and concluded at 4:00 p.m.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results For The Fourth Quarter And Financial Year Ended March 31, 2022
data.news_body:
The Board has approved the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the fourth quarter and financial year ended March 31, 2022, and the Audited Financial Statements (standalone and consolidated) as at March 31, 2022, recommended by the Audit Committee.
Pursuant to Regulation 33 and Regulation 52 of the Listing Regulations, please find enclosed herewith the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the fourth quarter and financial year ended March 31, 2022, along with the Auditors'' report(s) thereon.
We hereby declare that the Statutory Auditors of the Company, M/s Deloitte Haskins & Sells LLP, Chartered Accountants, have issued unmodified audit report(s) on
Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the financial year ended March 31 , 2022.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body:
The Board has approved the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the fourth quarter and financial year ended March 31, 2022, and the Audited Financial Statements (standalone and consolidated) as at March 31 , 2022, recommended by the Audit Committee. Pursuant to Regulation 33 and Regulation 52 of the Listing Regulations, please find enclosed herewith the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the fourth quarter and financial year ended March 31, 2022, along with the Auditors'' report(s) thereon.~
We hereby declare that the Statutory Auditors of the Company, M/s Deloitte Haskins & Sells LLP, Chartered Accountants, have issued unmodified audit report(s) on Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the financial year ended March 31 , 2022.

The Board has recommended a final dividend of Rs 10 (Rupees Ten) per equity share of Rs 2 (Rupees Two) each for the financial year ended March 31 , 2022.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting Of The Company Held On May 6, 2021
data.news_body:
With reference to our letter dated April 26, 2021, and in accordance with Regulation 30 of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (the 'Listing Regulations'), we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors (the 'Board') at its Meeting held today, i.e. Thursday, May 6, 2021, has approved the audited financial results (standalone and consolidated) for the fourth quarter and financial year ended March 31, 2021, and the audited financial statements (standalone and consolidated) as at March 31, 2021, recommended by the Audit Committee.

Pursuant to Regulation 33 and Regulation 52 of the Listing Regulations, please find enclosed herewith the audited financial results (standalone and consolidated) for the fourth quarter and financial year ended March 31, 2021, along with the Auditors'' report(s) thereon.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting Of The Company Held On May 6, 2021
data.news_body:
With reference to our letter dated April 26, 2021, and in accordance with Regulation 30 of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (the 'Listing Regulations'), we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors (the 'Board') at its Meeting held today, i.e. Thursday, May 6, 2021, has inter alia approved Financial Results for the fourth quarter and financial year ended March 31, 2021, and the audited financial statements (standalone and consolidated) as at March 31, 2021.
2. Dividend
The Board recommended a final dividend of Rs 4 (Rupees Four) per equity share of Rs 2 (Rupees Two) each for the financial year ended March 31, 2021.
A copy of the Press Release issued by the Company in respect of the above items is enclosed herewith.
The meeting commenced at 11:00 a.m. and concluded at 4:00 p.m.
